title: India: Rapists.
text: http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/ind... There's been many cases over the past few years in India, with many men getting caught raping very young girls, but there now seems a pattern, almost a culture for a large portion of these people, and because somethings actually being done about it, they're retaliating by raping even more girls, with the attitude, "who do you think you are, we'll do as we please". I do question how long this has been going on for, how my hundreds/thousands(?) of girls that have suffered at the hands of these people, and who new about it, I'd imagine it's a culture that goes up the chain, and not just the odd individual. How sick are they?, how backwards is this country, and some of it's people?.. Apparently one of two quickest developing countries in the world? Embarrassing.
